title: Support for TLS/SSL in TCP
content: In version 5.2.15 (to be released soon), TLS can be enabled in TCP via a simple configuration change:   <TCP      tls.enabled="true"      tls.client_auth="NEED"      tls.keystore_path="good-server.jks"      tls.keystore_password="password"      tls.keystore_alias="server" ... />   This installs an SSLSocketFactory into TCP, creating SSLSockets instead of Sockets and SSLServerSockets instead of ServerSockets.   This is an alternative to SYM_ENCRYPT.   Details can be found in [1].    Cheers,      [1]
